title: GuardDog Scan & Ecosystem Overview
description: The GuardDog dashboard provides end-to-end visibility into package scans, issues, and risks across Python, Go, NPM and Github Actions. It enables monitoring of trends, detection of threats, and analysis of package behaviors to strengthen software.

definition.content:
[GuardDog](https://github.com/DataDog/guarddog) is a CLI tool that allows you to identify malicious Python and npm packages, Go modules, and GitHub actions. It runs a set of heuristics on the package source code (through Semgrep rules) and on the package metadata.

The GuardDog dashboard provides end-to-end visibility into package scans, issues, and risks across Python, Go, NPM and Github Actions. It enables monitoring of trends, detection of threats, and analysis of package behaviors to strengthen software.

For more information, see the [GuardDog Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/guarddog/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
